00052 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00053 {
00054     MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData*) md;
00055 
00056     mmd->flag |= (MOD_MIR_AXIS_X | MOD_MIR_VGROUP);
00057     mmd->tolerance = 0.001;
00058     mmd->mirror_ob = NULL;
00059 }
00060 
00061 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00062 {
00063     MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData*) md;
00064     MirrorModifierData *tmmd = (MirrorModifierData*) target;
00065 
00066     tmmd->flag = mmd->flag;
00067     tmmd->tolerance = mmd->tolerance;
00068     tmmd->mirror_ob = mmd->mirror_ob;
00069 }
00070 
00071 static void foreachObjectLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00072                               void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00073                               void *userData)
00074 {
00075     MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData*) md;
00076 
00077     walk(userData, ob, &mmd->mirror_ob);
00078 }

00080 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00081                            struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00082                            Object *UNUSED(ob),
00083                            DagNode *obNode)
00084 {
00085     MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData*) md;
00086 
00087     if (mmd->mirror_ob) {
00088         DagNode *latNode = dag_get_node(forest, mmd->mirror_ob);
00089 
00090         dag_add_relation(forest, latNode, obNode,
00091                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Mirror Modifier");
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 static DerivedMesh *doMirrorOnAxis(MirrorModifierData *mmd,
00096                                    Object *ob,
00097                                    DerivedMesh *dm,
00098                                    int axis)
00099 {
00100     const float tolerance_sq = mmd->tolerance * mmd->tolerance;
00101     const int do_vtargetmap = !(mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_NO_MERGE);
00102     int is_vtargetmap = FALSE; /* true when it should be used */
00103 
00104     DerivedMesh *result;
00105     const int maxVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00106     const int maxEdges = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00107     const int maxLoops = dm->getNumLoops(dm);
00108     const int maxPolys = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00109     MVert *mv, *mv_prev;
00110     MEdge *me;
00111     MLoop *ml;
00112     MPoly *mp;
00113     float mtx[4][4];
00114     int i, j;
00115     int a, totshape;
00116     int *vtargetmap, *vtmap_a = NULL, *vtmap_b = NULL;
00117 
00118     /* mtx is the mirror transformation */
00119     unit_m4(mtx);
00120     mtx[axis][axis] = -1.0f;
00121 
00122     if (mmd->mirror_ob) {
00123         float tmp[4][4];
00124         float itmp[4][4];
00125 
00126         /* tmp is a transform from coords relative to the object's own origin,
00127          * to coords relative to the mirror object origin */
00128         invert_m4_m4(tmp, mmd->mirror_ob->obmat);
00129         mult_m4_m4m4(tmp, tmp, ob->obmat);
00130 
00131         /* itmp is the reverse transform back to origin-relative coordinates */
00132         invert_m4_m4(itmp, tmp);
00133 
00134         /* combine matrices to get a single matrix that translates coordinates into
00135          * mirror-object-relative space, does the mirror, and translates back to
00136          * origin-relative space */
00137         mult_m4_m4m4(mtx, mtx, tmp);
00138         mult_m4_m4m4(mtx, itmp, mtx);
00139     }
00140 
00141     result = CDDM_from_template(dm, maxVerts*2, maxEdges*2, 0, maxLoops*2, maxPolys*2);
00142 
00143     /*copy customdata to original geometry*/
00144     DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, 0, 0, maxVerts);
00145     DM_copy_edge_data(dm, result, 0, 0, maxEdges);
00146     DM_copy_loop_data(dm, result, 0, 0, maxLoops);
00147     DM_copy_poly_data(dm, result, 0, 0, maxPolys);
00148 
00149 
00150     /* subsurf for eg wont have mesh data in the */
00151     /* now add mvert/medge/mface layers */
00152 
00153     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT)) {
00154         dm->copyVertArray(dm, CDDM_get_verts(result));
00155     }
00156     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE)) {
00157         dm->copyEdgeArray(dm, CDDM_get_edges(result));
00158     }
00159     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY)) {
00160         dm->copyLoopArray(dm, CDDM_get_loops(result));
00161         dm->copyPolyArray(dm, CDDM_get_polys(result));
00162     }
00163 
00164     /* copy customdata to new geometry,
00165      * copy from its self because this data may have been created in the checks above */
00166     DM_copy_vert_data(result, result, 0, maxVerts, maxVerts);
00167     DM_copy_edge_data(result, result, 0, maxEdges, maxEdges);
00168     /* loops are copied later */
00169     DM_copy_poly_data(result, result, 0, maxPolys, maxPolys);
00170 
00171     if (do_vtargetmap) {
00172         /* second half is filled with -1 */
00173         vtargetmap = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * maxVerts * 2, "MOD_mirror tarmap");
00174 
00175         vtmap_a = vtargetmap;
00176         vtmap_b = vtargetmap + maxVerts;
00177     }
00178 
00179     /* mirror vertex coordinates */
00180     mv_prev = CDDM_get_verts(result);
00181     mv = mv_prev + maxVerts;
00182     for (i = 0; i < maxVerts; i++, mv++, mv_prev++) {
00183         mul_m4_v3(mtx, mv->co);
00184 
00185         if (do_vtargetmap) {
00186             /* compare location of the original and mirrored vertex, to see if they
00187              * should be mapped for merging */
00188             if (UNLIKELY(len_squared_v3v3(mv_prev->co, mv->co) < tolerance_sq)) {
00189                 *vtmap_a = maxVerts + i;
00190                 is_vtargetmap = TRUE;
00191             }
00192             else {
00193                 *vtmap_a = -1;
00194             }
00195 
00196             *vtmap_b = -1; /* fill here to avoid 2x loops */
00197 
00198             vtmap_a++;
00199             vtmap_b++;
00200         }
00201     }
00202     
00203     /* handle shape keys */
00204     totshape = CustomData_number_of_layers(&result->vertData, CD_SHAPEKEY);
00205     for (a = 0; a < totshape; a++) {
00206         float (*cos)[3] = CustomData_get_layer_n(&result->vertData, CD_SHAPEKEY, a);
00207         for (i = maxVerts; i < result->numVertData; i++) {
00208             mul_m4_v3(mtx, cos[i]);
00209         }
00210     }
00211     
00212     /* adjust mirrored edge vertex indices */
00213     me = CDDM_get_edges(result) + maxEdges;
00214     for (i = 0; i < maxEdges; i++, me++) {
00215         me->v1 += maxVerts;
00216         me->v2 += maxVerts;
00217     }
00218     
00219     /* adjust mirrored poly loopstart indices, and reverse loop order (normals) */
00220     mp = CDDM_get_polys(result) + maxPolys;
00221     ml = CDDM_get_loops(result);
00222     for (i = 0; i < maxPolys; i++, mp++) {
00223         MLoop *ml2;
00224         int e;
00225 
00226         /* reverse the loop */
00227         for (j = 0; j < mp->totloop; j++) {
00228             DM_copy_loop_data(result, result, mp->loopstart + j, mp->loopstart + maxLoops + mp->totloop - j - 1, 1);
00229         }
00230 
00231         ml2 = ml + mp->loopstart + maxLoops;
00232         e = ml2[0].e;
00233         for (j = 0; j < mp->totloop-1; j++) {
00234             ml2[j].e = ml2[j+1].e;
00235         }
00236         ml2[mp->totloop-1].e = e;
00237         
00238         mp->loopstart += maxLoops;
00239     }
00240 
00241     /* adjust mirrored loop vertex and edge indices */
00242     ml = CDDM_get_loops(result) + maxLoops;
00243     for (i = 0; i < maxLoops; i++, ml++) {
00244         ml->v += maxVerts;
00245         ml->e += maxEdges;
00246     }
00247 
00248     /* handle uvs,
00249      * let tessface recalc handle updating the MTFace data */
00250     if (mmd->flag & (MOD_MIR_MIRROR_U | MOD_MIR_MIRROR_V)) {
00251         const int do_mirr_u= (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_MIRROR_U) != 0;
00252         const int do_mirr_v= (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_MIRROR_V) != 0;
00253 
00254         const int totuv = CustomData_number_of_layers(&result->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV);
00255 
00256         for (a = 0; a < totuv; a++) {
00257             MLoopUV *dmloopuv = CustomData_get_layer_n(&result->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV, a);
00258             int j = maxLoops;
00259             dmloopuv += j; /* second set of loops only */
00260             for ( ; i-- > 0; dmloopuv++) {
00261                 if (do_mirr_u) dmloopuv->uv[0] = 1.0f - dmloopuv->uv[0];
00262                 if (do_mirr_v) dmloopuv->uv[1] = 1.0f - dmloopuv->uv[1];
00263             }
00264         }
00265     }
00266 
00267     /* handle vgroup stuff */
00268     if ((mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_VGROUP) && CustomData_has_layer(&result->vertData, CD_MDEFORMVERT)) {
00269         MDeformVert *dvert = (MDeformVert *) CustomData_get_layer(&result->vertData, CD_MDEFORMVERT) + maxVerts;
00270         int *flip_map= NULL, flip_map_len= 0;
00271 
00272         flip_map= defgroup_flip_map(ob, &flip_map_len, FALSE);
00273         
00274         if (flip_map) {
00275             for (i = 0; i < maxVerts; dvert++, i++) {
00276                 /* merged vertices get both groups, others get flipped */
00277                 if (do_vtargetmap && (vtargetmap[i] != -1))
00278                     defvert_flip_merged(dvert, flip_map, flip_map_len);
00279                 else
00280                     defvert_flip(dvert, flip_map, flip_map_len);
00281             }
00282 
00283             MEM_freeN(flip_map);
00284         }
00285     }
00286 
00287     if (do_vtargetmap) {
00288         /* slow - so only call if one or more merge verts are found,
00289          * users may leave this on and not realize there is nothing to merge - campbell */
00290         if (is_vtargetmap) {
00291             result = CDDM_merge_verts(result, vtargetmap);
00292         }
00293         MEM_freeN(vtargetmap);
00294     }
00295 
00296     return result;
00297 }
00298 
00299 static DerivedMesh *mirrorModifier__doMirror(MirrorModifierData *mmd,
00300                                              Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
00301 {
00302     DerivedMesh *result = dm;
00303 
00304     /* check which axes have been toggled and mirror accordingly */
00305     if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_AXIS_X) {
00306         result = doMirrorOnAxis(mmd, ob, result, 0);
00307     }
00308     if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_AXIS_Y) {
00309         DerivedMesh *tmp = result;
00310         result = doMirrorOnAxis(mmd, ob, result, 1);
00311         if (tmp != dm) tmp->release(tmp); /* free intermediate results */
00312     }
00313     if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_AXIS_Z) {
00314         DerivedMesh *tmp = result;
00315         result = doMirrorOnAxis(mmd, ob, result, 2);
00316         if (tmp != dm) tmp->release(tmp); /* free intermediate results */
00317     }
00318 
00319     return result;
00320 }
00321 
00322 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00323                                   DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00324                                   int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00325                                   int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00326 {
00327     DerivedMesh *result;
00328     MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData*) md;
00329 
00330     result = mirrorModifier__doMirror(mmd, ob, derivedData);
00331 
00332     if (result != derivedData)
00333         CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00334     
00335     return result;
00336 }
00337 
00338 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00339                                     struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00340                                     DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00341 {
00342     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00343 }

00346 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_Mirror = {
00347     /* name */              "Mirror",
00348     /* structName */        "MirrorModifierData",
00349     /* structSize */        sizeof(MirrorModifierData),
00350     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Constructive,
00351     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00352                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping
00353                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00354                             | eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode
00355                             | eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs,
00356 
00357     /* copyData */          copyData,
00358     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00359     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00360     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00361     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00362     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00363     /* applyModifierEM */   applyModifierEM,
00364     /* initData */          initData,
00365     /* requiredDataMask */  NULL,
00366     /* freeData */          NULL,
00367     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00368     /* updateDepgraph */    updateDepgraph,
00369     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00370     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00371     /* foreachObjectLink */ foreachObjectLink,
00372     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00373     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00374 };
